scripts.build: npm run build:latest && npm run build:current
scripts.build:current: docker build . -t jpmschuler/docker-node-php:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')
scripts.dockerpush: npm run dockerpush:latest && npm run dockerpush:current
scripts.dockerpush:current: docker push jpmschuler/docker-node-php:$(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')
scripts.tag:current: git tag $(npm pkg get version | tr -d '"')
scripts.release: npm run build && npm run dockerpush && npm run git:push
